item.title: In China, Rare Dissent Over a Program to Save on Drug Costs
item.description: Top doctors raised concerns about domestically made drugs, saying Beijing’s effort to lower costs is sacrificing quality.

item.title: Hegseth Is Second Cabinet Secretary to Need Tiebreaker Vote, After DeVos
item.description: In 2017, Betsy DeVos barely survived her confirmation vote to become President Trump’s secretary of education.

item.title: Nancy Leftenant-Colon, 104, Dies; Army Nurse Broke a Color Barrier
